title: ‘Walking With Ghosts’ Review: Gabriel Byrne Roams His Past
description: The Irish actor’s one-man show on Broadway delves into painful and playful memories alike. He even imitates the oddballs of his Dublin boyhood.
dc:creator: Alexis Soloski
media:description: Gabriel Byrne in “Walking With Ghosts,” a solo show drawn from his recent memoir, at the Music Box Theater in Manhattan.
